LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Turret.label: Quad machine gun bunker
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Turret.description: An entrenched, manned stationary machinegun bunker. Gunners can safely man the gun inside this permanent fortification. \n\n This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Gun.label: Quad machine gun
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Gun.description: Four machine guns mounted inside a bunker.
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Turret.label: Tank bunker
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Turret.description:
A stationary tank turret mounted on an entrenched concrete box. n
 Gunners can safely man this bunker fortification until it is destroyed.

 This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Gun.label: Anti tank cannon turret
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Gun.description: An anti tank cannon mounted on an armoured turret.
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Turret.label: Coastal battery
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Turret.description:
A heavy navy gun mounted on a large concrete bunker. Can effectively destroy enemies within range. n
 Gunners can safely man this permanent fortification until it is destroyed. 

 This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Gun.label: Coastal artillery
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Gun.description: A navy gun turret. Two operators are required to man this gun.
LanguageData.FT_Bullet_BatteryShell.label: Heavy explosive shell
LanguageData.FTC_SpotterBunker.label: Stational rangefinder
LanguageData.FTC_SpotterBunker.description: A rangefinder that uses light reflection triangulation to infer distance. Its elevated base enables it to cross mountains to calibrate and spot targets.
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Turret.label: quad machinegun bunker
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Turret.description: a manned stationary machinegun bunker half buried beneath as a permanent fortification, Gunner can safely man the gun inside \n\n This is a permanent structure, site wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Gun.label: quad machine gun
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_Flame.label: flamethrower bunker
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_Flame.description: a manned stationary flame thrower bunker half buried beneath as a permanent fortification, Gunner can safely man the gun inside \n\n This is a permanent structure, site wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_Flame_Gun.label: flame thrower
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_Flame_Gun.description: flame thrower mounted inside the bunker.
LanguageData.FT_Bullet_InfernoSpewer.label: inferno spewer shot
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_MG.label: Pillbox
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_MG.description: a manned stationary machinegun bunker half buried beneath as a permanent fortification, Gunner can safely man the gun inside \n\n This is a permanent structure, site wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_MG_Gun.label: quad machine gun
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_AT.label: Anti Tank gun bunker
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_AT.description: a manned stationary ATgun bunker half buried beneath as a permanent fortification, Gunner can safely man the gun inside \n\n This is a permanent structure, site wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_AT_Gun.label: anti tank gun
LanguageData.FTC_Wall_AT_Gun.description: an anti tank cannon mounted on an armoured turret.
LanguageData.FTC_Autocannon_Bunker.label: autocannon bunker
LanguageData.FTC_Autocannon_Bunker.description: a manned stationary autocannon bunker half buried beneath as a permanent fortification, Gunner can safely man the gun inside \n\n This is a permanent structure, site wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Autocannon_Bunker_Gun.label: autocannon
LanguageData.FTC_Autocannon_Bunker_Gun.description: an autocannon mounted inside the bunker.
